questions.question: OS mein process kya hai?
questions.explanation: Process execution mein ek program hota hai. Ismein program code, current activity, stack, heap, aur data section shamil hote hain.

questions.question: Kaunsa scheduling algorithm starvation cause kar sakta hai?
questions.explanation: SJF (Shortest Job First) starvation cause kar sakta hai kyunki chhote processes ko priority milti rehti hai aur lambe process wait karte reh jate hain.

questions.question: Context switch kya hai?
options: Process state save aur load karna
questions.explanation: Context switch current process ki state ko save karne aur agle process ki state ko load karne ka process hai.

questions.question: PCB ka full form kya hai?
questions.explanation: PCB (Process Control Block) mein process ki saari jankari hoti hai - jaise PID, state, registers, memory info, aadi.

questions.question: Inmein se kaunsa process state nahi hai?
questions.explanation: Compiling process state nahi hai. Main states hain: New, Ready, Running, Waiting, aur Terminated.

questions.question: Deadlock ka karan kya hai?
questions.explanation: Deadlock ke liye 4 conditions zaruri hain: Mutual Exclusion, Hold & Wait, No Preemption, aur Circular Wait.

questions.question: Time quantum kis algorithm mein use hota hai?
questions.explanation: Round Robin time quantum (time slice) ka use karta hai - har process ko cyclic order mein ek fixed time slot milta hai.

questions.question: Thrashing kya hai?
questions.explanation: Thrashing tab hoti hai jab system execute karne se zyada waqt paging mein bitata hai - isse performance bahut kharab ho jati hai.
